explains: n. 峡谷；裂口；分歧；深坑

sentences.en: Pat had earlier made a dive of 80 feet from the Chasm Bridge.
sentences.cn: 早些时，帕特曾从卡泽姆大桥进行过80英尺高的跳水。

sentences.en: Chasmal definition is resembling a chasm.
sentences.cn: 峡谷的定义是类似于一个裂口。

sentences.en: It is more of a chasm than a gap.
sentences.cn: 但这显然是一个鸿沟而不是什么缺口。
